intro: Acinodendron stenostachyum, commonly known as the narrow-stemmed acinodendron, is a member of the Rubiaceae family. It is a shrub or small tree native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly in countries like Kenya and Tanzania. The plant features simple, opposite leaves with a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Its flowers are small and clustered in inflorescences, typically white or pale yellow in color. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release its seeds, contributing to its dispersal in the natural environment.
